DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to use an innovative and integrated educational curriculum to deliver prenatal care and diabetes care for pre-gestational diabetic women from approximately the first trimester of pregnancy through delivery and the early postpartum period in a group care model. The group care model will be compared to a control group, a traditional, individual care model.
DOC.criteria: Clinically confirmed viable pregnancy at the time of enrollment. Able to provide consent for participation. Diabetes diagnosed prior to 12 weeks gestation. Initiation of care by 20 weeks gestation. Age 18 years or older. Not planning to deliver at UnityPoint Health Meriter Hospital.
